## Sub-Clustering Analysis of Cluster 7 in Integrated Rat Dataset: Visualization of CMV and MEM Sub-Clusters 

```{r} 
#Always using the RNA assay
DefaultAssay(aligned_rat_merged) <- "RNA"
#To create sub-clusters of the cluster 7 and adding a new column sub.clusters that contains the new Idents.
aligned_rat_merged<-FindSubCluster(aligned_rat_merged, "7", graph.name = "RNA_snn",  subcluster.name = "sub.clusters",  resolution = 0.35, algorithm = 1)
```

```{r} 
#To visualize the new sub-clusters withing "CMV" & "MEM" in rat.
DimPlot(aligned_rat_merged, group.by = "sub.clusters", split.by = "orig.ident" ,label = T)
```
